REFORTS OF WORKSHOPS AND SEMINARS
W-l Public School Broadcasting (Third Allerton Seminar) - Harry Lamb, Editor.
A report of the deliberations and recommendations of the seminar on
in™school broadcasting, held at Allerton Baric, University of Illinois,
June 15-24, 1952. 50 pp. Paper. $1.00.
¥-2 In-School Writers* Seminar - Edward Stasheff, Editor. A report of the
seminar for writers of in-school radio programs held at Station KSLH,
St. Louis, Missouri, June 7-11* 1954. 36 pp. Paper. $1.00.
W-5 NAEB Lincoln Lodge Seminar on Educational Television - Burton Paulu, Editor.
A report of the deliberations and recommendations of leaders in the
field of educational broadcasting who gathered at the University of
Wisconsin, June 21-27, 1953, for an intensive "thinlc session" about
educational television, June, 1953* 109 PP* Paper. $2.00.
W-6 NAEB First TV Production Workshop, 1953 - Edward Stasheff, Editor. Report
of production workshop for persons engaged in educational television,
held at the University of Illinois, August 23-September 18, 1953*
September, 1953* 112 pp. Paper. $2;00.
W-7 NAEB Second TV Production Workshop, 1954 - Edward Stasheff, Editor. Report
of the production workshop for persons engaged in educational television
held at Michigan State University, August 23-September 10, 1954. An
account of its lectures, demonstrations, procedui’es, and projects.
April, 1955* 133 PP* Paper. $2.00.
W~8 NAEB First TV Engineering Workshop, 1954 - Cecil S. Bidlack, Editor. Report
of the engineering workshop for technical personnel in educational
television, held in New York City, October 22-26, 1954. June, 1955*
6l pp. Paper. $2.00.
¥-9 NAEB Management Seminar, 1953 - Report of the seminar for educational tele¬
vision management personnel, held at Iowa State College. September,
1955* 42 pp. Paper. $1.00.
W-13 NAEB Third TV Production Workshop, 1955 - Edward Stasheff, Editor. Report of
the production workshop for persons engaged in educational television,
held at the State University of Iowa, August l4-September 3, 1955* 1956*
72 pp. Paper. $2.00.
W-l4 NAEB Second TV Engineering Workshop, 1955 - Cecil S. Bidlack, Editor. Report
of the engineering workshop for technical personnel in educational
television, held at Michigan State University, September 12-l6, 1955*
1956. 189 PP* Paper. $2.00.
W-l6 NAEB Radio Program Planning Seminar - Walt Whitaker, Editor. Report of the
Radio Program Planning Seminar held at Allerton Park, University of
Illinois, April 21-24, 1957> for personnel engaged in educational
radio program planning. 1958. 88 pp. Paper. $2.00.
